comments:

with my browser I can access this site. This is the exception in the log-file:

you should either allow (through your firewall's rule machanism) java.exe to
access the internet or , if you use a procy, you can get the proxy plugin from
bug 19258

Thank you, it works with the plugin. The plugin should be included in the
standard eclipse installation.

we are working on it ;-)
You can review it and talk to laurent if you want to improve it... welcome to
teh open source ;-)
